title: To be Grateful
arabic_body: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
english_body: O Allah, help me remember You, to be grateful to You, and to worship You in an excellent manner.

title: Seeking Forgiveness
arabic_body: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ التَّوَابُ الرَّحِيمُ
english_body: O Allah, forgive me and accept my repentance. Verily, You are the Most-Relenting, the Most-Merciful.

title: For Protection
arabic_body: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
english_body: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

title: For Peace of Mind
arabic_body: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا آتِ نَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
english_body: O our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

title: For Strength
arabic_body: رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَا أَنزَلْتَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
english_body: My Lord, indeed I am in need of whatever good You send down to me.

title: For Guidance
english_body: Guide us to the Straight Path.

title: For Success
arabic_body: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي سَأَلْتُكَ النَّجَاحَ وَالْفَوزَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
english_body: O Allah, I ask You for success and victory in this world and the Hereafter.

title: For Good Health
arabic_body: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ وَعَافِهِ وَحَرِّرْهُ مِنَ الْأَلْمِ
english_body: O Allah, grant him/her healing and recovery and free him/her from pain.

title: For Patience
arabic_body: رَبِّ فَاغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ وَأَنَا الْمُؤْمِنُ
english_body: My Lord, forgive me, accept my repentance, and grant me patience.

title: For Happiness
english_body: O Allah, make our happiness in Your obedience.
